titles.title: Shepherd Of My Soul, I Give You Full Control

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Shepherd of my soul, I give You full control.
Wherever You may lead, I will follow.
I have made the choice to listen for Your voice.
Wherever You may lead, I will go.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Be it in a quiet pasture or by a gentle stream,
The Shepherd of my soul is by my side.
Should I face a mighty mountain,
Or a valley dark and deep.
The Shepherd of my soul will be my guide.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Pastor de mi alma
Te doy control total.
Donde quiera que me guies, seguiré.
Yo he decidido a escuchar tu voz;
Donde quiera que me guies, yo iré.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Sea en pastos delicados, o aguas de reposo,
El Pastor de mi alma allí estará.
Sea frente a un monte, o un produndo valle,
El Pastor de mi alma me guiará.
